amendment.description: To make available funds for the Army Corps of Engineers for water restoration projects and facilities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1723 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1723 proposed by Senator Reid. (consideration: CR S11605; text: CR S11605) To make available funds for the Army Corps of Engineers for water restoration projects and facilities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1723 proposed by Senator Reid.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1723 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
